string-array.name: data_description_hotel
string-array.item: Introducing Indonesia’s reference in luxury hospitality, The Trans Luxury Hotel. A creation by Trans Corporation, it is a sophisticated blend of Indonesian tradition with a refined contemporary interpretation, right in the heart of Bandung city, together with Trans Studio Bandung - one of the biggest indoor theme parks in the world, Trans Studio Mall, ibis Bandung Trans Studio and Masjid Agung Trans Studio Bandung. The Trans Luxury Hotel is the splendid choice for you who are seeking a luxurious treat for your holiday. Get pampered with the most excellent services and make your holiday memorable by staying here. \nFrom business event to corporate gathering, The Trans Luxury Hotel provides complete services and facilities that you and your colleagues need.

In addition to the standard of Indonesia Care, all guests get free Wi-Fi in all rooms and free parking if arriving by car. Strategically situated in Cihampelas, allowing you access and proximity to local attractions and sights. Don\'t leave before paying a visit to the famous Trans Studio Bandung. Rated with 4 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to massage, restaurant and fitness center on-site. Located on the Cihampelas, a famous shopping street in Bandung, Grand Tjokro Premiere Bandung offers clean and modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi access in the entire area of the property, a rooftop swimming pool, meeting rooms, and an on-site restaurant.

In addition to the standard of Indonesia Care, all guests get free Wi-Fi in all rooms and free parking if arriving by car. Conveniently situated in the Pasteur part of Bandung, this property puts you close to attractions and interesting dining options. Don\'t leave before paying a visit to the famous Trans Studio Bandung. Rated with 4 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to massage, restaurant and fitness center on-site. Located in the main gate of Bandung City, ASTON Pasteur Hotel welcomes you to the capital of West Java, also known as Paris van Java. The hotel is strategically located in the Pasteur area, just five minutes from the tollgate.

Hotel NEO Malioboro is a unique, contemporary, 100 % smoke-free hotel for travelers who favor an active and healthy lifestyle while appreciating good design, comfortable rooms, professional service, and great facilities yet choose to travel on a sensible budget. Each of the 154 rooms was designed for both business and leisure travelers delivering a creative workspace and a relaxing stay. Hotel NEO Malioboro dengan konsep kontemporer dan 100% hotel bebas rokok untuk pelancong yang menyukai gaya hidup aktif dan sehat dan menghargai desain yang bagus namun memilih untuk melakukan perjalanan dengan anggaran yang masuk akal.

GRAMM HOTEL by Ambarrukmo - Formerly Grand Ambarrukmo Yogyakarta provides a daily buffet breakfast. Open all day, The Samara Restaurant serves a selection of local and international dishes. Alternatively, 24-hour room service is available for guests who want to dine in the comfort of their rooms. Guests can also enjoy light bites and refreshments at the Arcadaz Lounge. This hotel is the perfect choice for couples seeking a romantic getaway or a honeymoon retreat. Enjoy the most memorable nights with your loved one by staying at GRAMM HOTEL by Ambarrukmo (Formerly – Grand Ambarrukmo).

Whether you are planning an event or other special occasions, The Alana Yogyakarta Hotel is a great choice for you with a large and well-equipped function room to suit your requirements. The Alana Hotel n Convention Center – Yogyakarta is located in the mix used a complex of Mataram City, Yogyakarta which comprises the Alana Hotel, Apartment Residence, a lifestyle sidewalk, and Mataram city International Convention Center. The hotel is also conveniently close to Adisucipto International Airport, Borobudur, Malioboro, and the city center.

This hotel is the perfect choice for couples seeking a romantic getaway or a honeymoon retreat. Enjoy the most memorable nights with your loved one by staying at Wyndham Casablanca Jakarta. These grand deluxe and executive hotel rooms, junior, presidential suites and condo-style hotel suites that comfortably sleep two to six guests. Grand deluxe and executive rooms comfortably sleep two guests and offer one king bed or two twin beds. Executive business rooms and junior suites comfortably sleep two guests and feature one king bed.

Not all apartment allow guests with pets, but Ascott Jakarta welcome your furry friend with its special policy. This pet friendly hotel lets you to enjoy holiday without having to worry about leaving your pet at home. To experience the pulsating energy of one of the world\'s most populous cities, one should visit Jakarta. Despite its gleaming metropolis facade, Indonesia’s capital remains firmly rooted in its culture. It is a city where skyscrapers and heritage buildings meld, exhibiting the progress of the cosmopolitan city through the years.

This resort is the perfect choice for couples seeking a romantic getaway or a honeymoon retreat. Enjoy the most memorable nights with your loved one by staying at The Apurva Kempinski Bali. Standing atop the majestic cliff of Nusa Dua, with breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean and tropical garden, this five-star hotel in Bali offers a collection of 475 iconic rooms, suites and villas with unique culinary journey, indigenous spa treatments, spacious meeting rooms and alluring chapels.

Kanvaz Village Resort is located in the heart of Seminyak in Bali, Indonesia. The hotel is designed as an open house, where it is good to wander, rest, find yourself. Located in Seminyak’s most prestigious street, Kanvaz is an urban boutique hotel that is inspired by Indonesia’s fascinating culture. At Kanvaz, we recognise that like paintings, no two guests are alike, and our team take the time to personalise your experience with us. Within walking distance of the beach, we’ve created a classic boutique hotel experience based on authentic Asian hospitality and local culture, where we focus on you. Journey to the heart of Seminyak, Bali’s most vibrant area for eats, beats and shopping and indulgent spa and wellness treatments. Journey through Balinese culture at our modern boutique resort where we’ve made a conscious decision to promote and empower local talent, through design, art, architecture and the culinary arts. Kanvaz is no ordinary hotel.
